web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: AlertDialogTitle now consumes titleId from AlertDialogContext and applies it as the id attribute on the h2 element, completing the aria-labelledby connection with AlertDialogContent.

web/src/hooks/useFocusTrap.ts.description: Auto-focus implementation uses double requestAnimationFrame technique for smooth animation timing - the first RAF waits for the browser's paint, and the second ensures CSS transitions/animations have started. Focus priority is: initialFocusRef > first focusable element > container. Animation frame IDs are tracked in a ref for proper cleanup.
